name: FULLWAVE
body:
# Recent publications

**2010**

* [3D Elastic wavefield inversion in the time domain, Guasche et al., EAGE 2010.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/A022.pdf?raw=true)
* [A strategy for waveform inversion without an accurate starting model, Shah et al., EAGE 2010.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/P383.pdf?raw=true)
* [Waveform inversion from a poor starting model – using a residual ‘drip-feed’ strategy, Shah et al., EAGE 2010](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/WS6Shah.pdf?raw=true)
* [3D full-wavefield tomography: imaging beneath heterogeneous overburden, Warner et al., EAGE 2010.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/W620.pdf?raw=true)
* [Time vs frequency for 3D wavefield tomography, Umpleby et al., EAGE 2010.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/W617.pdf?raw=true)
* [Seismic anisotropy effects in 3D wavefield tomography, Stekl et al., EAGE 2010](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/W616.pdf?raw=true)
* [Waveform inversion of surface seismic data without the need for low frequencies, Shah et al., SEG 2010.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/1E3513440.pdf?raw=true)
* [3D elastic wavefield tomography in the time domain, Guasch et al., SEG 2010.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/2E3513792.pdf?raw=true)
* [A domain decomposition method for 3-D Controlled Source Electromagnetics, da Silva et al., SEG 2010.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/2E3513868.pdf?raw=true)

**2011**

* [Full Waveform Inversion: a North Sea OBC case study, Ratcliffe et al., SEG 2011.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/2E3627688.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full-wavefield seismic tomography of vibrator data on land, Al-Yaqoobi et al., EAGE 2011.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/P024.pdf?raw=true)

**2012**

* [Which physics for full-wavefield seismic inversion? Warner et al., EAGE 2012.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/EAGE_physics.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full-waveform seismic inversion at reservoir depths, Nangoo et al., EAGE 2012.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/EAGE-Tommeliten.pdf?raw=true)
* [A Phase-unwrapped solution for overcoming a poor starting model in full-wavefield inversion, Shah et al., EAGE 2012.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/P014.pdf?raw=true)
* [Least-squares Reverse-time Migration, Yao & Jakubowicz, EAGE 2014.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/X043.pdf?raw=true)
* [Quality assured full-waveform inversion: Ensuring starting model adequacy, Shah et al., SEG 2012.](phase.pdf?raw=true)
* [Elastic 3D full-waveform inversion, Guasch et al., SEG 2012.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/elastic2.pdf?raw=true)
* [3D constrained inversion of CSEM data with acoustic velocity using full waveform inversion, da Silva et al., SEG 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2012-1449%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Non-Linear Least-Squares Reverse-Time Migration, Yao & Jakubowicz, SEG 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2012-1435%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [3-D Time-domain Full Waveform Inversion of a Valhall OBC dataset, Liu et al., SEG 2012.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2012-1105%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [A finite element multifrontal method for 3D CSEM modeling in the frequency domain, da Silva et al., Geophysics 2012.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/geo2010-0398%252E1.pdf?raw=true)

**2013**

* [Anisotropic 3D full-waveform inversion, Warner et al., Geophysics, 2013.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/geo2012-0338.pdf?raw=true)
* [Next-Generation Seismic Experiments: Wide-Angle, Multi-Azimuth, 3D, Full-Waveform Inversion, Morgan et al., Geophysical Journal International, 2013,](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/GJI-2013.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full-waveform inversion of cycle-skipped seismic data by frequency down-shifting, Warner et al., SEG 2013.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/down_shift.pdf?raw=true)
* [The application of full waveform seismic inversion to a narrow-azimuth marine dataset, Nangoo et al., EAGE 2013.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/Th 10 04.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full waveform inversion in a complex geological setting - A narrow azimuth towed streamer case study from the Barents Sea, Jones et al., EAGE 2013.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/We%2011%2006.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full Waveform Inversion - A Strategy to Invert Cycle-skipped 3D Onshore Seismic Data, Al-Yaqoobi & Warner, EAGE 2013.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/We%2011%2014.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full waveform inversion – dealing with limitations of 3D onshore seismic data, Al-Yaqoobi & Warner, SEG 2013.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2013-0799%252E1.pdf?raw=true)

**2014**

* [Adaptive Waveform Inversion: FWI without cycle skipping - Theory, Warner & Guasch, EAGE 2014.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/We%20E106%2013.pdf?raw=true)
* [Adaptive Waveform Inversion: FWI without cycle skipping - Applications, Guasch & Warner, EAGE 2014.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/We%20E106%2014.pdf?raw=true)
* [Non-physical water density as a proxy to improve data fit during acoustic FWI, Silverton et al., EAGE 2014.]
(https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/We-ELI1-16.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full waveform inversion on Jackdaw ocean bottom nodes data in North Sea, Yoon et al., EAGE 2014.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/E10611.pdf?raw=true)
* [Adaptive Waveform Inversion: Theory, Warner & Guasch, SEG 2014.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2014-0371%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Reflection FWI for both reflectivity and background velocity, Yao et al., EAGE 2014.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/We%20E106%2010.pdf?raw=true)
* [AVA Attributes for Lithology and Fluid Discrimination Based on a Quadratic Form of Zoeppritzs Equations, Negrete Cadena et al., EAGE 2014.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/We%20E102%2013.pdf?raw=true)
 
**2015**

* [Global anisotropic 3D FWI, Debens et al., SEG 2015.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2015-5921944%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Automatic Wavefield Reconstruction Inversion, da Silva, SEG 2015.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2015-5908659%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Robust Adaptive Waveform Inversion, Warner & Guasch, SEG 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2015-5853026%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Preconditioning FWI with approximate receiver Green’s functions, Burgess & Warner, SEG 2015.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2015-5844253%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Constrained waveform inversion in salt-affected datasets, Esser et al., SEG 2015.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2015-5834716%252E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Least-squares reverse-time migration in a matrix-based formulation, Yao & Jakubowicz, Geophysical Prospecting 2015.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/gpr12305.pdf?raw=true)
* [Adaptive Waveform Inversion – FWI Without Cycle Skipping, Warner & Guasch, SEG 2015.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/fwi2015-003.pdf?raw=true)

**2016**

* [Constrained waveform inversion: Automatic salt flooding with inclusions, Guasch et al., EAGE 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/EAGE2016-Salt-Lluis.pdf?raw=true)
* [Constrained waveform inversion for automatic salt flooding, Esser et al., The Leading Edge, 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/tle35030235E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Least-squares RTM with L1 norm regularization, Wu et al., SEG 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2016-13948030E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Reflection FWI, Irabor & Warner, SEG 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2016-13944219E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Acoustic full-waveform inversion in an elastic world, Calderon Agudo et al., SEG 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/segam2016-13843013E1.pdf?raw=true)
* [Offset-variable density improves acoustic full-waveform inversion: a shallow marine case study, Silverton et al., Geophysical Prospecting, 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/gpr2016-Akela.pdf?raw=true)
* [Next-generation seismic experiments – II: wide-angle, multi-azimuth, 3-D, full-waveform inversion of sparse field data, Morgan et al., Geophysical Journal International 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/gji2016A.pdf?raw=true) - first part of large file
* [Next-generation seismic experiments – II: wide-angle, multi-azimuth, 3-D, full-waveform inversion of sparse field data, Morgan et al., Geophysical Journal International 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/gji2016B.pdf?raw=true) - second part of large file
* [Adaptive waveform inversion: Theory, Warner & Guasch, Geophysics 2016.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/geo2015-0387%252E1.pdf?raw=true)

[Return to Home Page](http://fullwave3d.github.io/)
